participant_1.background:
I grew up in the Midwest where the summers are hot and the watermelon is sweet.
I'm not very good at keeping my apartment clean, but I love it anyway.
I enjoy comfort foods like macaroni and cheese, mashed potatoes, and chicken pot pie.
i will study computer science.
I remember the feeling of freedom when I ran through the woods behind my house as a child.

participant_2.background:
I have been working on my car at night, trying to fix it without them knowing.
I read up on the history of my city in preparation for a visit from my best friend.
the weather here is very cold , but so beautiful in the spring.
i am an accountant.
i met my birth mother when i was sixteen.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
Hi, I'm doing well, thanks! I'm just working on my car, trying to fix it without my parents knowing.
Oh, that sounds like a fun project! How's it going so far?
It's going pretty well, I've already gotten the engine started, so I'm just working on some minor things now.
That's awesome! I'm not very good at fixing cars, but I always admire people who can do it.
Thanks! It's definitely not easy, but it's a lot of fun to learn.
What are you planning to do with your car when you're done fixing it?
I'm not sure yet, I'm thinking about taking it on a road trip or something.
That sounds like a great idea! I love road trips.
Me too, they're the best way to see the country.
So, what's your favorite thing about where you live?
I love the weather here in the spring. It's so beautiful and warm.
I can imagine! I've never been to the Midwest, but I've heard it's beautiful.
It is! You should definitely come visit sometime.
I will! Thanks for chatting with me, it was nice to meet you!
You too! Have a great day!
